item.title: About
item.description: I am a Second year student pursuing Artificial Intelligence & Data Science @ SATI . I have a keen interest in Artificial Intelligence, Deep Learning. I am an aspiring Open Source enthusiast. Till now I have contributed to many small, big and intermediate projects either supporting with documentations of respective projects or with actual Code to the project. Skills I am a passionate coder. I like to code because it developes your mind and enhances your problem solving skills.

Git for beginners by me Set git user info (assuming that you are the only user of this System) git config --global user.name <name> git config --global user.email <email> User info for a certain Repository only git congig user.name <name> git config user.email <email> Initialize git before using git commands git init Add files on staging area to be committed/Save git add <file_name> git add . (stages all the files all together) See current git status

Linux SHELL Guide Shows all hidden files and folders along with normal ones. ls -a list lot of information about non-hidden files and directories la -l list above info for hidden files and directories too ls -la OR ls -l -a to switch to a dir same as cd but it just saves the path from which you came pushd <path> to switch back to dir from which you came with pushd.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Nothing to see here… Move along!
